Name: 7c84c9ae-0936-43fe-9e13-2450b9050710
Query:
let terminated_users = _GetWatchlist("HalaWatchlist") 
| project User = SearchKey;
let file_downloads = OfficeActivity 
| where (RecordType == "SharePointFileOperation" or RecordType == "OneDriveFileOperation") 
| where Operation == "FileDownloaded" 
| where UserId in (terminated_users) 
| summarize DownloadedFiles = make_set(SourceFileName) by UserId 
| extend Action = "Downloaded files from SharePoint/OneDrive";
let secure_link_creation = OfficeActivity 
| where UserId in (terminated_users) 
| where Operation == "SecureLinkCreated" 
| summarize LinksCreated = make_set(SourceFileName) by UserId 
| extend Action = "Created secure links";
let added_users_to_links = OfficeActivity 
| where UserId in (terminated_users) 
| where Operation == "AddedToSecureLink" 
| summarize AddedUsers = make_set(TargetUserOrGroupName) by UserId 
| extend Action = "Added users to secure links";
let guest_added = OfficeActivity 
| where Operation == "AddedToSecureLink" 
| where TargetUserOrGroupType == "Guest" 
| where UserId in (terminated_users) 
| summarize GuestsAdded = make_set(TargetUserOrGroupName) by UserId 
| extend Action = "Added guest user to secure link";
let cloud_file_sharing_sites = dynamic([
    "box.com", "drive.google.com", "dropbox.com", "mega.io", "mediafire.com", 
    "pCloud.com", "sync.com", "zoho.com", "Tresorit.com", "nextcloud.com", 
    "spideroak.com", "onedrive.com", "we.tl", "sendspace.com", "hightail.com", 
    "icloud.com", "4shared.com", "rapidshare.com", "zippyshare.com", 
    "filefactory.com", "sugarsync.com", "transfernow.net", "sendgb.com", 
    "files.fm", "smash.com", "sharefile.com", "gofile.io", "uploadfiles.io", 
    "filemail.com", "transfer.pcloud.com"
]);
let cloud_access = DeviceNetworkEvents 
| where RemoteUrl in (cloud_file_sharing_sites) 
| where InitiatingProcessAccountUpn in (terminated_users) 
| summarize AccessedSites = make_set(RemoteUrl) by InitiatingProcessAccountUpn 
| extend Action = "Accessed cloud file-sharing sites";
let external_emails = EmailEvents 
| where SenderFromAddress  in (terminated_users) 
| where RecipientEmailAddress !contains "synergyhousing.com" and RecipientEmailAddress !contains "synergyglobalhousing" 
| summarize RecipientEmails = make_set(RecipientEmailAddress), EmailSubjects = make_set(Subject), EmailCount = count() by SenderFromAddress 
| extend Action = "Sent emails to external recipients";
let specific_apps = dynamic(["notion.so", "wetransfer.com", "discord.com"]);
let app_usage = DeviceNetworkEvents 
| where RemoteUrl in (specific_apps) 
| where InitiatingProcessAccountUpn in (terminated_users) 
| summarize AccessedApps = make_set(RemoteUrl) by InitiatingProcessAccountUpn 
| extend Action = "Accessed Notion, WeTransfer, or Discord";
let recent_signins = SigninLogs 
| where UserPrincipalName in (terminated_users) 
| summarize RecentSignins = make_list(pack("TimeGenerated", TimeGenerated, "IPAddress", IPAddress, "AppDisplayName", AppDisplayName, "Status", Status), 3) by UserPrincipalName 
| extend Action = "Recent sign-ins";
let actions_summary = file_downloads 
| union secure_link_creation 
| union added_users_to_links 
| union guest_added 
| union cloud_access 
| union external_emails 
| union app_usage 
| union recent_signins 
| summarize Actions = make_set(Action), DownloadedFiles = make_set(DownloadedFiles), LinksCreated = make_set(LinksCreated), AddedUsers = make_set(AddedUsers), GuestsAdded = make_set(GuestsAdded), AccessedSites = make_set(AccessedSites), RecipientEmails = make_set(RecipientEmails), EmailSubjects = make_set(EmailSubjects), AccessedApps = make_set(AccessedApps), RecentSignins = make_set(RecentSignins) by UserId = coalesce(UserId, InitiatingProcessAccountUpn, SenderFromAddress, UserPrincipalName);
actions_summary 
| extend Summary = strcat("User: ", UserId, "\nActions: \n - ", Actions, "\nDetails:\n - Downloaded Files: ", tostring(DownloadedFiles), "\n - Links Created: ", tostring(LinksCreated), "\n - Added Users to Links: ", tostring(AddedUsers), "\n - Guests Added: ", tostring(GuestsAdded), "\n - Accessed Cloud Sites: ", tostring(AccessedSites), "\n - Sent Emails: ", tostring(RecipientEmails), "\n - Email Subjects: ", tostring(EmailSubjects), "\n - Accessed Apps: ", tostring(AccessedApps), "\n - Recent Sign-ins: ", tostring(RecentSignins)) 
| project UserId, Summary
